snippet: Companies like Google, Amazon, PayPal and Apple are looking for the route to dominance over future alternatives, both real-world and virtual, to cash and credit cards.
abstract: Companies like Google, Amazon, PayPal and Apple are looking for the route to dominance over future alternatives, both real-world and virtual, to cash and credit cards.

headline.main: Tech Titans Are Vying to Be Your Pocketbook
headline.print_headline: Tech Titans Are Vying To Be Your Pocketbook
